medical_history.chief_complaint: Worsening abdominal pain that migrated from mid abdomen to right lower quadrant.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Pain started 6 days ago with left flank pain, diagnosed as non-obstructive stone. Pain progressively worsened over the week, migrating to the right lower quadrant. Associated nausea and vomiting occurred for 2 days but has since resolved. INR was 8 today, experienced episodes of nosebleed.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Redo-Aortic Valve Replacement (mechanical), history of Rheumatic Heart Disease, Mitral Stenosis, and Aortic Insufficiency, Atrial Fibrillation, Pulmonary Hypertension, Hypothyroidism, Urinary retention, Uterine Fibroids (s/p Left oophorectomy, partial left salpingectomy).
medical_history.family_history: No diabetes, hypertension, or coronary artery disease.
